text: Sullivan Award may refer to: * Algernon Sydney Sullivan Award or Mary Mildred Sullivan Award; awarded at 29-grantee institutions of the Algernon Sydney Sullivan Foundation * Annie Sullivan Award, given to Special Education Teachers, named after Helen Keller's teacher * Carl R. Sullivan Award of the International Fisheries Section of the American Fisheries Society * James E. Sullivan Award, awarded to outstanding amateur athletes in the United States * Paula E. Sullivan Award, advertising industry award given annually by the Ad Club of San Diego * Sullivan Award for Heroism by the San Francisco Fire Department * Walter Sullivan Award for Excellence in Science Journalism * William Matheus Sullivan Award, annual development award to gifted opera singers by the William Matheus Sullivan Musical Foundation
title: Sullivan Award
